motds.quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you donâ€™t stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.

motds.quote: That's 'cause I got people with me, people who trust each other, who do for each other and ain't always looking for the advantage.
motds.author: Captain Tight Pants

motds.quote: The war had taught me to cherish the present because tomorrow might not ever come to pass.
motds.author: Claire Elizabeth Beauchamp Fraser

motds.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
motds.author: Einstein
